version_description:
- minor user interface improvements;
- minor bug fixes

- minor user interface improvements;
- minor bug fixes

A completely new stage-based mode. Tomb of the Mask is now two games in one: endless arcade and settled stages. Dozens of rooms with deadly traps and wicked creatures will challenge your reaction and strategical skills. Avoid death, collect stars, complete missions in a new ultimate version of Tomb of the Mask. Features:
- 60 stages
- dozens of missions
- major changes in game balance
- entirely readjusted UI
- a new music track added

v.1.2.1: fixed crash/freeze issue
v.1.2: A completely new stage-based mode. Tomb of the Mask is now two games in one: endless arcade and settled stages. Dozens of rooms with deadly traps and wicked creatures will challenge your reaction and strategical skills. Avoid death, collect stars, complete missions in a new ultimate version of Tomb of the Mask. Features:
- 60 stages
- dozens of missions
- major changes in game balance
- entirely readjusted UI
- a new music track added

- recovery of lost progress, earned by some players before version 1.2
- 5 new stages
- adjusted the difficulty of stages that were too hard to pass
- performance optimizations and stability improvements
- bug fixes

- bug fixes

What's New in Version 1.2.3:
- recovery of lost progress, earned by some players before version 1.2
- 5 new stages
- adjusted the difficulty of stages that were too hard to pass
- performance optimizations and stability improvements

- game localization into 9 more languages
- minor improvements and bug fixes

- 10 new stages added
- now you can turn on/off notifications in Settings
- new icon
- bug fixes
- bug fixes

- 25 new stages added
- bug fixes
- bug fixes

- 2 new mechanics implemented;
- 45 brand new stages added;
- bug fixes
- bug fixes
- performance and stability improvements
- performance and stability improvements
- performance and stability improvements
- iPhone X support
- minor performance and stability improvements
- minor performance and stability improvements
